website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable gaming chair with several adjustment options that also has a striking look.
pros: Reclines from 90-150 degrees and locks in a range
Headrest and lumbar support are removable if you wish
Arm rests and height are also adjustable
cons: Narrow design isn't comfortable for all sizes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: Sick chair, pretty comfy. Goes perfect with my set up. I dont use the reclining feature at all but I'm sure its steady.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Super fast assembly and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality that will last a long time and assembly was super easy. I have 2 of these chairs now and I assembled them both in about 30 minutes. The plastic covers took a little bit of work to line up properly (because of great fit and bolt protection) but once that was done the rest was a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Don Seoul Oh

customer_reviews.title: Good value, easy to assemble, sturdy chair
customer_reviews.text: Chair arrived packaged well. No damaged or missing parts. Was very easy to assemble. Instructions we easy to follow. Tool was included and all hardware was individually packaged and labeled. The chair is sturdy, looks nice and is relatively comfortable. Lumbar supports are removable via clasps in the back of the chair. All-in-all, for the price it is a really nice chair.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Not The Best, Not the Worst
customer_reviews.text: Had this chair for a year now, however, starting to tear apart a bit. Overall, the chair is okay if you plan on sitting down for a 1-3 hours any longer than that it becomes very uncomfortable. Does not have any back support besides the pillow they send with it, but even the pillow feels uncomfortable. I would recommend to purchase a better chair that can keep you comfortable for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Great chair so far
customer_reviews.text: Great chair so far. My son likes it.I bought him a different chair for Christmas that was doubled the price.That chair was received damaged.I sent it back and purchased the Merax.
customer_reviews.author: S R P

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble and it’s super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES his chair! It was easy to assemble and it’s super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This chair is the perfect chair for my son especially for his weight
customer_reviews.author: Chatty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chair very support and no issues with build quality
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable chair, but it came without assembly instructions, so it wasn’t very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Johnp0660

customer_reviews.title: It holds me up!
customer_reviews.text: I have the orange version. My weight is 270 and this chair holds up strong. Padding under the butt is not the best but for 69.99 this was a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Duncanate

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable chair. Its seat is big enough. Support pillows are very impressed. Great value and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie duncan

product_meta.title: Merax Justice Series Racing Style Gaming Chair Ergonomic High Back PU Leather (Red)
product_meta.description:
Merax has been always devoting itself to delivering the best products of high quality and cost-effectiveness to our customers. Our only pursuit is to meet our customers’ all kinds of demands no matter how hard it is to fulfill.

Our Merax chair designers spent days and nights drafting and discussing what kind of design is going to be suitable for our customers and satisfy their demands. Finally, they came into being and turn out to be popular and welcome for theirs features. 

Except for focusing on their great-looking design, our structural engineers always spared no effort in designing easy set-up structure frame during assembly. And also instruction is committed to be straightforward enough for everyone to understand.

This Merax Justice Series Racing Style Gaming Chair is upholstered in high quality PU leather with aesthetic three-color abreast stripes. Ergonomic design with removable headrest and lumbar support pillow offers you better sitting experience. With this specially designed chair, you could take a nap comfortably at any time you want!

Weight capacity: 225 lbs 

Notice:

Items may slightly differ from photo in terms of color due to the lighting or your monitor's display.

Measurement error may exist due to manual measurement.
feature_bullets: Stylish Design Computer Desk Chair: Featuring aesthetic design of three-color abreast stripes which adds a stylish and unique taste to the chair
Reclining Gaming Chair: Recline locking system for you to lock the back at any angle from 90-150 degree
Maximum Comfort: Equipped with soft spacious cushioned seating and removable headrest and lumbar support pillows greater improve the comfort
Adjustment: Adjustable swivel chair armrests and about 2.8 inch adjustable height provides more flexibility
Stability: Big and sturdy base ensure the whole stabiity for long time use for the racing gaming chair.
